entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.3°C

Observed at: La Scie 11:30 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30 except minus 20 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30 except minus 20 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
